options.content: on $node_name ? Help Configuration Home

targets.query: meta.id.keyword: $host AND !meta.labels.name.keyword: perfsonar-generate_motd.service AND !meta.labels.name.keyword: perfsonar-configure_nic_parameters.service AND values.node_systemd_unit_state: * AND meta.labels.state.keyword: active

meta.id.keyword: $host AND !meta.labels.name.keyword: perfsonar-generate_motd.service AND !meta.labels.name.keyword: perfsonar-configure_nic_parameters.service AND values.node_systemd_unit_state: * AND meta.labels.state.keyword: active
meta.id.keyword: $host AND type.keyword: node AND values.node_network_speed_bytes.val: *
meta.id.keyword: $host AND type.keyword: node AND meta.labels.scope: global
type.keyword: perfsonar_host AND meta.id.keyword: $host AND values.perfsonar_pscheduler_runs: *
type.keyword: perfsonar_host AND meta.id.keyword: $host AND values.perfsonar_pscheduler_archiving: *
type.keyword: perfsonar_host AND meta.id.keyword: $host AND values.perfsonar_pscheduler_paused: *
type.keyword: perfsonar_host AND meta.id.keyword: $host AND  values.perfsonar_pscheduler_http_queue: *

panels.title: Time offset between local system and reference clock

list.definition: {"find":"terms", "field":"meta.labels.address.keyword", "query": "meta.id: $host AND type.keyword: node AND meta.labels.scope.keyword: global", "size": 1}
list.name: node_ip
list.query: {"find":"terms", "field":"meta.labels.address.keyword", "query": "meta.id: $host AND type.keyword: node AND meta.labels.scope.keyword: global", "size": 1}
